title: Donald Trump 'I Call My Own Shots Accumulation Of Data' Meme

organizations.name: elon musk defends trump advisory role the tesla

text:
Donald Trump. Photo: Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images Donald Trump tweets. The rest of the Twitter world memes. Today‚Äôs raw material: Trump‚Äôs insistence that he calls his own shots, ‚Äúlargely based on an accumulation of data.‚Äù (Read: Trump definitely didn‚Äôt not know that he was promoting Steve Bannon to the National Security Council , as the New York Times reported yesterday and Morning Joe discussed this morning.)
Turns out, President Trump isn‚Äôt the only one who calls their shots using an accumulation of data. I mean, really, how else would you want to call a shot.
waiter: no coke, is pepsi ok?
